textTemplates.name: Email_Subject_for_Chandler_Welsh
textTemplates.text:
One Opportunity Stage is Qualified

1.Opportunity Name :{!$Record.Name}

2.Account Name :{!$Record.Account.Name}

3.Opportunity Owner :{!$Record.Owner.Name}

4.Link to Opportunity :Record Link

5.ACV Bookings :{!$Record.ACV_Bookings__c}

One Opportunity Stage is Qualified

1.Opportunity Name :{!$Record.Name}

2.Account Name :{!$Record.Account.Name}

3.Opportunity Owner :{!$Record.Owner.Name}
